page.title: 20VALLEE DES VAUX
page.content:
{Vallee Des Vaux}is situated in the North of St.Helier. On the west side are trees, ferns and grasses. On the east side are meadows filled with buttercups and grazing cows. Along the whole length of the valley there is a stream following southward from a duck pond at the top which was the original mill pond of a water mill built before 1700. The granite mill house is now the { {Harvest Barn}public house and restaurant. The restaurant is open all year round and in the summer evenings the area outside is popular with the local people and visitors who sit and talk in the setting sun.
{This work was produced by the children {of JANVRIN,MONT CANTEL,FIRST TOWER,LA {POUQUELAYE AND ROUGE BOUILLON SCHOOLS {JERSEY. }
